description: Because the Dash Warriors won against Oomiya`s senior citizen team the Silver Warriors, they travel to the Amazon in Brazil to try out his natural tracks that he built. When the arrive they find the natural track has been destroyed by a storm when they are suddenly attacked by the Amazon Warriors. One of the boys has Horizon, an original Mini 4WD created by Yonkurou`s father who disappeared.

titles.title: ダッシュ! 四駆郎 ホライゾン軍団VSダッシュ軍団
